name: Uday Kapoor
review: These Chicken Tikka Masalaare really spicy and delicious! I love the flavor and the crispy skin. Would definitely order again.

name: Puja Butt
review: I'm a huge fan of spicy food and these Dal Makhani did not disappoint. They were cooked to perfection and had just the right amount of heat.

name: Pranav Gupta
review: While the Chana Masala had good flavor, they were a bit too spicy for my taste. Also, the portion size was a bit small for the price.

name: Jai Mehta
review: This Chicken Biryani was amazing! The leg patty was juicy and flavorful and the toppings were fresh and delicious. Would definitely recommend.

name: Dhruv Patel
review: The Fish Curry was good, but it was a bit overcooked for my liking. The fries that came with it were really tasty though.

name: Arjun Kapoor
review: The Masala Dosa was just okay. Nothing really stood out about it and I was a bit disappointed for the price.
